Game.Name: Racing Fever (Europe) (En,De,Es,It)
Game.plot: Racing Fever is a Racing game, developed by Naps Team and published by Neko Entertainment, which was released in Europe in 2005.http://www.gamefaqs.com/portable/gbadvance/home/951795.html
Game.Notes: Choose from one of 6 sexy, super-charged vehicles as you speed your way across a variety of challenging tracks in the car of your dreams!
